content.description: The figure shows two point charges with equal positive charge and three labeled points, all of which lie on the same line.
content.question: Which of the following best shows the electric field in the plane of the page and near the two charges, which are represented by the two dots?

choices.label: The figure presents a diagram of two points in an electric field, with the electric field vectors directed inwards toward both points.
The figure presents a diagram of two points in an electric field, with the electric field vectors directed outwards, away from both points.

The figure presents a diagram of two points in an electric field, with the electric field vectors directed outward, away from the particle on the right, and moving toward the particle on the left. The left portion of the electric field vectors are directed inwards, moving toward the particle on the left.

The figure presents a diagram of two points in an electric field, with the field vectors directed outward, away from the particle on the left, and moving toward the particle on the right. The right portion of the electric field vectors are directed inwards, moving toward the particle on the right.

content.answer: The figure presents a diagram of two points in an electric field, with the electric field vectors directed outwards, away from both points.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
